actualUser - Static variable in class application.DBUtils
 
addMoney(int) - Method in class auctionClasses.User
Part of the STRATEGY PATTERN adds the money if the amount is non negative if is negative, it subtracts the amount

application - package application
 
attach(AuctionObserver) - Method in class auctionClasses.Auction
connects the observer to the list of observers
Auction - Class in auctionClasses
Class which manages the backend of the application Implements serializable, so we can store all the information about the current auction and send it to others via internet
Auction(AuctionController, User) - Constructor for class auctionClasses.Auction
Constructor creating the current auction with given information Also, it calls a function to create a new unit which will be sold in the auction
auctionClasses - package auctionClasses
 
AuctionController - Class in application
class that controls especially the auction flow and its GUI

AuctionFollower - Interface in auctionClasses
interface that informs all objects which are implementing it
AuctionObserver - Class in application
Part of the OBSERVER PATTERN abstract Class that object implements
